column1: ## Mean, standard deviation, standard error (sd/sqrt(n)), and number of answers to the question "How happy are you?"
## on a 0(extremely unhappy)-10(extremely happy) scale, as computed from the data table corresponding to the ESS from 2002 to 2020
## downloaded from the data portal at http://www.europeansocialsurvey.org/.
